faqs.question: What is Cats Blender Plugin?
faqs.answer:
# Cats Blender Plugin

[info]Cats Blender Plugin is the unofficial version maintained by Team Neoneko. It's a tool designed to shorten steps needed to import and optimize models into VRChat.[/info]

## Supported Model Formats:
• MMD
• XNALara
• Mixamo
• Source Engine
• Unreal Engine
• DAZ/Poser
• Blender Rigify
• Sims 2
• Motion Builder
• 3DS Max
• And potentially more!

With Cats it takes only a few minutes to upload your model into VRChat. All the hours long processes of fixing your models are compressed into a few functions!

[link]https://catsblenderplugin.xyz|Visit the Cats Blender Plugin Website[/link]

[note]This version is the unofficial version. To find out what is happening to the official version go here: https://catsblenderplugin.xyz/wiki.html?version=current#what-is-the-current-status-of-the-official-cats-blender-plugin[/note]

history.changes: Updated with unofficial status information and added link to website

faqs.question: What is Avatar Toolkit?
faqs.answer:
# Avatar Toolkit

[info]Avatar Toolkit is the next generation of avatar optimization tools, planned for Blender 5.0+[/info]

## Key Features:
• More Advanced Armature Validation System
• Comprehensive Import Support
• Standardize bones system
• Rigify to Unity system
• Full Pose Mode Features
• FBX and Resonite Export Options
• Optimization Tools Suite
• Custom Avatar Tools
• Viseme Creation
• Atlas Texturing system
• Eye Tracking Support (Legacy and VRChat SDK3)
• Built-in Updater
• Debug Options

[link]https://avatartoolkit.xyz|Visit the Avatar Toolkit Website[/link]

[note]Avatar Toolkit is currently in Alpha. There will be issues and bugs as development continues.[/note]

history.changes: Updated feature list, added Alpha status note and website link

faqs.question: What is Cats Blender Plugin End of Life?
faqs.answer:
# Cats Blender Plugin End of Life

[info]Team Neoneko has designated Cats Blender Plugin as end-of-life since September 2024.[/info]

## Reasons for End-of-Life Status:
• Dependency on third-party plugins that receive minimal or no updates
• Legacy codebase predating Blender 2.8
• User misconceptions about functionality (e.g., the "Fix MMD Model" button)

It's time to retire Cats Blender Plugin and transition to a more modern solution. This is why we're developing Avatar Toolkit—a new, modern Blender toolkit with in-house MMD tools to help optimize your models.

Moving forward, no new features will be added to Cats Blender Plugin. We will only maintain Cats until Avatar Toolkit reaches a more stable state and achieves feature parity.

[link]https://github.com/teamneoneko/Avatar-Toolkit/issues/65|Suggest new features for Avatar Toolkit[/link]

[note]Please direct all feature requests to Avatar Toolkit rather than Cats Blender Plugin.[/note]
